title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.39 - DRAW BRIDGE Sign (W3-6)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.39 - DRAW BRIDGE Sign (W3-6)

State Regulations

Guidance: 03A Where the DRAW BRIDGE (W3-6) sign is supplemented with
a flashing beacon, the operation of the beacon should be coordinated with the
operation of the bridge so that drivers seeing the beacon operating can expect
to be stopped at the bridge; drivers seeing the beacon inoperative (or ceasing
operation) should expect to proceed without being stopped at the
bridge. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2C.39

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
